question.instruction: Listen to the recording and answer the multiple -choice question by selecting the correct response. Only one response is correct.

template.title: The researchers supported by the National Institute of Child Health ___.

options.o0: took care of women who're suffering from alcohol
options.o1: have spent a lot of money on fertility
options.o3: said alcohol may affect women's fertility
options.o4: have also worked for Harvard University
